#summary System requirements for simulator

Simulator is in download section: <br>
http://code.google.com/p/psimulator/downloads/

= Linux =
All utils should be in repositories of your distribution.<br>
On Debian-based distribution (like Ubuntu, ..) install with one command:<br>
{{{ 
aptitude install sun-java6-jre rlwrap telnet 
}}}


== Java Runtime Environment ==
If not in repository, install from:<br>
http://www.java.com/en/download/


== rlwrap ==
For all features version 0.32+ 
If not in repository, install from: <br>
http://utopia.knoware.nl/~hlub/rlwrap/ <br>
or <br>
http://snapshot.debian.org/binary/rlwrap


== telnet ==
If not in repository, install from:<br>
http://snapshot.debian.org/binary/telnet/
